metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5191 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
VMware Tools prior to 10.0.9 contains multiple file system races in libDeployPkg, related to the use of hard-coded paths under /tmp. Successful exploitation of this issue may result in a local privilege escalation. CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

open-vm-tools - 2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1
open-vm-tools-desktop - 2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> probably DoS only with symlink restrictions

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1').
